Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 20th overall pick, by Boston in 2018...
Traded from Boston to Houston on 3/2/2018 (Going to HOU: C James Ikner. Going to BOS: RF Roberto Noriega)...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/26/2018, off Jeffrey Horne (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/15/2018, off Zacarias Romero (SLB)...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 9/8/2021...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $778,571 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $778,571 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,685,714 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/17/2025 to a 3-year deal worth $9,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2025, hitting .474 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 4/4/2027 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
